com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport

Interface WriteArgs


  • public interface WriteArgs
    UPA Write Arguments used in the Channel.write(TransportBuffer, WriteArgs, Error) call.
    See Also:
    Channel, WritePriorities, WriteFlags

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int bytesWritten()
      The number of bytes to be written, including any transport header overhead and taking into account any compression, for this write call.
      void clear()
      Clears UPA Write Arguments.
      int flags()
      Write flags used for Channel.write(TransportBuffer, WriteArgs, Error).
      void flags(int flags)
      Write flags used for Channel.write(TransportBuffer, WriteArgs, Error).
      int priority()
      Priority to flush the message for Channel.write(TransportBuffer, WriteArgs, Error).
      void priority(int priority)
      Priority to flush the message for Channel.write(TransportBuffer, WriteArgs, Error).
      long seqNum()
      sequence number of the message for Channel.write(TransportBuffer, WriteArgs, Error).
      void seqNum(long seqNum)
      Specifies the sequence number of the message Channel.write(TransportBuffer, WriteArgs, Error).
      int uncompressedBytesWritten()
      The number of bytes to be written, including any transport header overhead but not taking into account any compression, for this write call.

    • Method Detail

      • priority

        void priority(int priority)
        Priority to flush the message for Channel.write(TransportBuffer, WriteArgs, Error). Must be in the range of WritePriorities.HIGH - WritePriorities.LOW.
        Parameters:
        priority - the priority to set
        See Also:
        WritePriorities

      • priority

        int priority()
        Priority to flush the message for Channel.write(TransportBuffer, WriteArgs, Error).
        Returns:
        the priority
        See Also:
        WritePriorities

      • flags

        void flags(int flags)
        Write flags used for Channel.write(TransportBuffer, WriteArgs, Error). Must be in the range of WriteFlags.NO_FLAGS - WriteFlags.DIRECT_SOCKET_WRITE.
        Parameters:
        flags - the flags to set
        See Also:
        WriteFlags

      • flags

        int flags()
        Write flags used for Channel.write(TransportBuffer, WriteArgs, Error).
        Returns:
        the flags
        See Also:
        WriteFlags

      • bytesWritten

        int bytesWritten()
        The number of bytes to be written, including any transport header overhead and taking into account any compression, for this write call.
        Returns:
        the bytesWritten

      • uncompressedBytesWritten

        int uncompressedBytesWritten()
        The number of bytes to be written, including any transport header overhead but not taking into account any compression, for this write call.
        Returns:
        the uncompressedBytesWritten

      • seqNum

        void seqNum(long seqNum)
        Specifies the sequence number of the message Channel.write(TransportBuffer, WriteArgs, Error).
        Parameters:
        seqNum - the sequence number to set

      • seqNum

        long seqNum()
        sequence number of the message for Channel.write(TransportBuffer, WriteArgs, Error).
        Returns:

      • clear
